abstract: Perform fast Fourier transforms in place on multiple-signal 1D complex data.
overview:
## Overview

The functions in this group use the following operation for a complex-to-complex transform:

The temporary buffer versions perform the same operation but use a temporary buffer for improved performance.

items.description: Computes a forward or inverse in-place, single-precision complex FFT on multiple signals.
items.name: vDSP_fftm_zip

items.description: Computes a forward or inverse in-place, double-precision complex FFT on multiple signals.
items.name: vDSP_fftm_zipD

items.description: Computes a forward or inverse in-place, single-precision complex FFT on multiple signals using a temporary buffer.
items.name: vDSP_fftm_zipt

items.description: Computes a forward or inverse in-place, double-precision complex FFT on multiple signals using a temporary buffer.
items.name: vDSP_fftm_ziptD

sections.title: In-Place FFT Functions with Temporary Buffer

items.description: Perform fast Fourier transforms out of place on multiple-signal 1D complex data.
items.name: Out-of-Place Functions for 1D Multiple-Signal Complex FFT

title: In-Place Functions for 1D Multiple-Signal Complex FFT
